original_text: Jashobeam the son of Zabdiel was in charge of the first division in the first month; in his division were 24,000.
korean_text: 첫째 달 반의 반장은 삽디엘의 아들 야소브암이요 그의 반에 이만 사천 명이라

sentences.original_text: Jashobeam the son of Zabdiel was in charge of the first division
sentences.korean_translation: 사브디엘의 아들 야소브암은 첫 번째 부대를 담당했다
